Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Biomedical Material/Reagent/Image Enhancement Agent/Contrast Agent/Positive Contrast Agent
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: Contrast media that has a higher amplification and intensity than the surrounding tissue making the contrast look more opaque when seen in an x-ray.
